attributes.additional_details: We would like the Government to permanently scrap GCSE’s and let teachers grade us on the work and tests we have done throughout the year.
attributes.background: Teachers themselves have admitted that making children do hours and hours of exams to decide their future is discussing. Instead, they would rather grade them because they know how they work and understand them better than a piece of paper.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571777
